verses.verse: בַּיָּמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> In those days הָהֵ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> those חָלָ֥ה <S%H2470><s%> sick חִזְקִיָּ֖הוּ <S%H2396><s%> was Hezekiah לָמ֑וּת <S%H4191><s%> unto death וַיָּב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> came אֵ֠לָיו <S%H413><s%> and יְשַׁעְיָ֨הוּ <S%H3470><s%> And Isaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אָמ֜וֹץ <S%H531><s%> of Amoz הַנָּבִ֗יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> unto him and said אֵלָ֜יו <S%H413><s%> to him כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> unto him Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צַ֣ו <S%H6680><s%> in order לְבֵיתֶ֔ךָ <S%H1004><s%> Set thine house כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for מֵ֥ת <S%H4191><s%> for thou shalt die אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and not תִֽחְיֶֽה׃ <S%H2421><s%> and not live

וַיַּסֵּ֧ב <S%H5437><s%> turned חִזְקִיָּ֛הוּ <S%H2396><s%> Then Hezekiah פָּנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> his face אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַקִּ֑יר <S%H7023><s%> toward the wall וַיִּתְפַּלֵּ֖ל <S%H6419><s%> and prayed אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

וַיֹּאמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> And said אָנָּ֤ה <S%H577><s%> I beseech יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> now O LORD זְכָר־ <S%H2142><s%> Remember נָ֞א <S%H4994><s%> now אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> how הִתְהַלַּ֣כְתִּי <S%H1980><s%> thee how I have walked לְפָנֶ֗יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before בֶּֽאֱמֶת֙ <S%H571><s%> thee in truth וּבְלֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> heart שָׁלֵ֔ם <S%H8003><s%> and with a perfect וְהַטּ֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [that which is] good בְּעֵינֶ֖יךָ <S%H5869><s%> in thy sight עָשִׂ֑יתִי <S%H6213><s%> and have done וַיֵּ֥בְךְּ <S%H1058><s%> wept חִזְקִיָּ֖הוּ <S%H2396><s%> And Hezekiah בְּכִ֥י <S%H1058><s%> wept גָדֽוֹל׃ <S%H1419><s%> sore ס
וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> Then came the word יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְשַׁעְיָ֖הוּ <S%H3470><s%> to Isaiah לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

הָל֞וֹךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> and say אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to חִזְקִיָּ֗הוּ <S%H2396><s%> to Hezekiah כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהֵי֙ <S%H430><s%> the God דָּוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> of David אָבִ֔יךָ <S%H1><s%> thy father שָׁמַ֙עְתִּי֙ <S%H8085><s%> I have heard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תְּפִלָּתֶ֔ךָ <S%H8605><s%> thy prayer רָאִ֖יתִי <S%H7200><s%> I have seen אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דִּמְעָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H1832><s%> thy tears הִנְנִי֙ <S%H2005><s%> behold יוֹסִ֣ף <S%H3254><s%> behold I will add עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto יָמֶ֔יךָ <S%H3117><s%> unto thy days חֲמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> fif עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <S%H6240><s%> teen שָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> years

וּמִכַּ֤ף <S%H3709><s%> out of the hand מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> of the king אַשּׁוּר֙ <S%H804><s%> of Assyria אַצִּ֣ילְךָ֔ <S%H5337><s%> And I will deliver וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> הָעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> thee and this city הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> and I וְגַנּוֹתִ֖י <S%H1598><s%> and I will defend עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הָעִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> this city הַזֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> likewise

וְזֶה־ <S%H2088><s%> This לְּךָ֥ הָא֖וֹת <S%H226><s%> And this [shall be] a sign מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto thee from the LORD אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> after יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> will do יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> this thing הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> he דִּבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> that he hath spoken

הִנְנִ֣י <S%H2005><s%> behold מֵשִׁ֣יב <S%H7725><s%> Behold I will bring again אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צֵ֣ל <S%H6738><s%> the shadow הַֽמַּעֲל֡וֹת <S%H4609><s%> of the degrees אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which יָרְדָה֩ <S%H3381><s%> which is gone down בְמַעֲל֨וֹת <S%H4609><s%> dial אָחָ֥ז <S%H271><s%> of Ahaz בַּשֶּׁ֛מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> in the sun אֲחֹרַנִּ֖ית <S%H322><s%> backward עֶ֣שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> ten מַעֲל֑וֹת <S%H4609><s%> degrees וַתָּ֤שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> returned הַשֶּׁ֙מֶשׁ֙ <S%H8121><s%> So the sun עֶ֣שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> ten מַעֲל֔וֹת <S%H4609><s%> degrees בַּֽמַּעֲל֖וֹת <S%H4609><s%> by which degrees אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which יָרָֽדָה׃ <S%H3381><s%> it was gone down ס

מִכְתָּ֖ב <S%H4385><s%> The writing לְחִזְקִיָּ֣הוּ <S%H2396><s%> of Hezekiah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah בַּחֲלֹת֕וֹ <S%H2470><s%> when he had been sick וַיְחִ֖י <S%H2421><s%> and was recovered מֵחָלְיֽוֹ׃ <S%H2483><s%> of his sickness

אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I אָמַ֗רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> I said בִּדְמִ֥י <S%H1824><s%> in the cutting off יָמַ֛י <S%H3117><s%> of my days אֵלֵ֖כָה <S%H1980><s%> enter בְּשַׁעֲרֵ֣י <S%H8179><s%> to the gates שְׁא֑וֹל <S%H7585><s%> of the grave פֻּקַּ֖דְתִּי <S%H6485><s%> I am deprived יֶ֥תֶר <S%H3499><s%> of the residue שְׁנוֹתָֽי׃ <S%H8141><s%> of my years

אָמַ֙רְתִּי֙ <S%H559><s%> I said לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no אֶרְאֶ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> I shall not see יָ֔הּ <S%H3050><s%> the LORD יָ֖הּ <S%H3050><s%> [even] the LORD בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land הַחַיִּ֑ים <S%H2416><s%> of the living לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no אַבִּ֥יט <S%H5027><s%> I shall behold אָדָ֛ם <S%H120><s%> man ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> more עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> among י֥וֹשְׁבֵי <S%H3427><s%> no more with the inhabitants חָֽדֶל׃ <S%H2309><s%> of the world

דּוֹרִ֗י <S%H1755><s%> Mine age נִסַּ֧ע <S%H5265><s%> is departed וְנִגְלָ֛ה <S%H1540><s%> and is removed מִנִּ֖י <S%H4480><s%> at כְּאֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> tent רֹעִ֑י <S%H7473><s%> from me as a shepherd's קִפַּ֨דְתִּי <S%H7088><s%> I have cut off כָאֹרֵ֤ג <S%H707><s%> like a weaver חַיַּי֙ <S%H2416><s%> my life מִדַּלָּ֣ה <S%H1803><s%> with pining sickness יְבַצְּעֵ֔נִי <S%H1214><s%> he will cut me off מִיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> from day עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until לַ֖יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> [even] to night תַּשְׁלִימֵֽנִי׃ <S%H7999><s%> wilt thou make an end

שִׁוִּ֤יתִי <S%H7737><s%> I reckoned עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until בֹּ֙קֶר֙ <S%H1242><s%> till morning כָּֽאֲרִ֔י <S%H738><s%> [that] as a lion כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> after that יְשַׁבֵּ֖ר <S%H7665><s%> so will he break כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עַצְמוֹתָ֑י <S%H6106><s%> all my bones מִיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> from day עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until לַ֖יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> [even] to night תַּשְׁלִימֵֽנִי׃ <S%H7999><s%> wilt thou make an end

כְּס֤וּס <S%H5483><s%> Like a crane עָגוּר֙ <S%H5693><s%> [or] a swallow כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> so אֲצַפְצֵ֔ף <S%H6850><s%> so did I chatter אֶהְגֶּ֖ה <S%H1897><s%> I did mourn כַּיּוֹנָ֑ה <S%H3123><s%> as a dove דַּלּ֤וּ <S%H1809><s%> fail עֵינַי֙ <S%H5869><s%> mine eyes לַמָּר֔וֹם <S%H4791><s%> [with looking] upward אֲדֹנָ֖י <S%H136><s%> the Lord עָֽשְׁקָה־ <S%H6234><s%> I am oppressed לִּ֥י עָרְבֵֽנִי׃ <S%H6148><s%> undertake

מָֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> What אֲדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> What shall I say וְאָֽמַר־ <S%H559><s%> ? he hath both spoken לִ֖י וְה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> Himself עָשָׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> unto me and himself hath done אֶדַּדֶּ֥ה <S%H1718><s%> [it] I shall go softly כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שְׁנוֹתַ֖י <S%H8141><s%> all my years עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> because מַ֥ר <S%H4751><s%> in the bitterness נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> of my soul

אֲדֹנָ֖י <S%H136><s%> O Lord עֲלֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H5921><s%> and יִֽחְי֑וּ <S%H2421><s%> by these [things men] live וּלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בָּהֶן֙ חַיֵּ֣י <S%H2416><s%> and in all these [things is] the life רוּחִ֔י <S%H7307><s%> of my spirit וְתַחֲלִימֵ֖נִי <S%H2492><s%> so wilt thou recover וְהַחֲיֵֽנִי׃ <S%H2421><s%> me and make me to live

הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> Lo לְשָׁל֖וֹם <S%H7965><s%> Behold for peace מַר־ <S%H4751><s%> great לִ֣י מָ֑ר <S%H4751><s%> bitterness וְאַתָּ֞ה <S%H859><s%> who חָשַׁ֤קְתָּ <S%H2836><s%> but thou hast in love נַפְשִׁי֙ <S%H5315><s%> to my soul מִשַּׁ֣חַת <S%H7845><s%> [delivered it] from the pit בְּלִ֔י <S%H1097><s%> of corruption כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for הִשְׁלַ֛כְתָּ <S%H7993><s%> for thou hast cast אַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> behind גֵוְךָ֖ <S%H1460><s%> thy back כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חֲטָאָֽי׃ <S%H2399><s%> all my sins

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> cannot שְׁא֛וֹל <S%H7585><s%> For the grave תּוֹדֶ֖ךָּ <S%H3034><s%> cannot praise מָ֣וֶת <S%H4194><s%> thee death יְהַלְלֶ֑ךָּ <S%H1984><s%> can [not] celebrate לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> cannot יְשַׂבְּר֥וּ <S%H7663><s%> cannot hope יֽוֹרְדֵי־ <S%H3381><s%> thee they that go down ב֖וֹר <S%H953><s%> into the pit אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> for אֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H571><s%> for thy truth

חַ֥י <S%H2416><s%> The living חַ֛י <S%H2416><s%> the living ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> who יוֹדֶ֖ךָ <S%H3034><s%> he shall praise כָּמ֣וֹנִי <S%H3644><s%> do הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> thee as I [do] this day אָ֣ב <S%H1><s%> the father לְבָנִ֔ים <S%H1121><s%> to the children יוֹדִ֖יעַ <S%H3045><s%> shall make known אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H571><s%> thy truth

יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD לְהוֹשִׁיעֵ֑נִי <S%H3467><s%> [was ready] to save וּנְגִנוֹתַ֧י <S%H5058><s%> me therefore we will sing my songs נְנַגֵּ֛ן <S%H5059><s%> to the stringed instruments כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All יְמֵ֥י <S%H3117><s%> all the days חַיֵּ֖ינוּ <S%H2416><s%> of our life עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> had said יְשַׁעְיָ֔הוּ <S%H3470><s%> For Isaiah יִשְׂא֖וּ <S%H5375><s%> Let them take דְּבֶ֣לֶת <S%H1690><s%> a lump תְּאֵנִ֑ים <S%H8384><s%> of figs וְיִמְרְח֥וּ <S%H4799><s%> and lay [it] for a plaister עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַשְּׁחִ֖ין <S%H7822><s%> upon the boil וְיֶֽחִי׃ <S%H2421><s%> and he shall recover

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> also had said חִזְקִיָּ֖הוּ <S%H2396><s%> Hezekiah מָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> What א֑וֹת <S%H226><s%> What [is] the sign כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אֶעֱלֶ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> that I shall go up בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> to the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Jehovah ס
